name: Global Game Jam 2023 - What if I told you the history of humanity in 5 simple minigames?! (The game)
name_original: Global Game Jam 2023 - What if I told you the history of humanity in 5 simple minigames?! (The game)
description:
A short game where you will go through landmarks in the human eras. Travel through time to find the roots of what allowed us to evolve as species.

Credits:

  • Serotonin - Programming and Design
  • Onion - Sounds and Arts Assets
  • @NetCreature - Programming and Design
  • @PabloMiceli24 -Programming and Design
  • Candula - Art Assets and Animation
